alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Kenosha; Racine; Walworth; Waukesha (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 28 at 4:13PM CDT until August 28 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Walworth County in southeastern Wisconsin... Western Racine County in southeastern Wisconsin... Waukesha County in southeastern Wisconsin... Eastern Jefferson County in southeastern Wisconsin... Western Kenosha County in southeastern Wisconsin... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 413 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Watertown to near Harvard, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Waukesha, New Berlin, Brookfield, Menomonee Falls, Muskego, Watertown, Antioch, Whitewater, Pewaukee, Sussex, Elkhorn, Hartland, Delavan, Lake Geneva, Mukwonago, Delafield, Elm Grove, Union Grove, East Troy and Paddock Lake. This includes the following Locations Pewaukee Lake, Ottawa Lake Recreation Area, and Pinewoods Campground. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
